article_title: Southeast Missourian newspaper, Cape Girardeau, MO
article_text: Out of the Ashes... Arises Trump the Terminator

og.description: Growing up in the 1950's and 60's meant I spent many hours in history  classes learning about life in the USSR, and how fortunate I was to have the freedoms and individual liberties as a citizen in the USA.  Every morning I started my school day with fellow students proudly facing the classroom flag and saying the pledge of allegiance.  Back in the day, our teachers encouraged patriotism and love of country, a practice that is slowly disappearing in today's schools...
og.title: The New America -- USA or USSR?
